goal.tools.mc.evaluator.goal

Class GOALEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.evaluator.goal.GOALEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Evaluator

    public class GOALEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Evaluator
    Represents an evaluator component for GOAL by implementing the Evaluator interface. To evaluate queries, the GOAL interpreter is used through invocations to MentalState#mscQuery. The specific MentalState object to evaluate queries in is passed to the GOALEvaluator object during object construction by means of a reference to the GOALMentalStateConverter object that is created and used by a GOALProg object. As such, a GOALEvaluator instance are linked to a GOALProg instance; maybe it would be nicer to remove this link, i.e. give GOALEvaluator a GOALMentalStateConverter of its own.
    Author:
    sungshik
